title: Increase of world population due to agriculture

content.question: Which of the following factors contributed most to the increase of world population in the period 1750 to 1900 C.E.?

choices.label: A decline in the frequency and deadliness of warfare
Improvements in agricultural productivity and food distribution
A rapid increase in birth rates throughout the globe

content.answer: Improvements in agricultural productivity and food distribution

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
